code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PasswordRequirements=_ref=>{let{password}=_ref;const[requirements,setRequirements]=useState({length:false,lowercase:false,uppercase:false,number:false,special:false});useEffect(()=>{setRequirements({length:password.length>=8,lowercase:/[a-z]/.test(password),uppercase:/[A-Z]/.test(password),number:/[0-9]/.test(password),special:/[!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>]/.test(password)});},[password]);const RequirementItem=_ref2=>{let{achieved,text}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2 mb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`w-1.5 h-1.5 rounded-full ${achieved?"bg-green-600":"bg-amber-700"}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm text-amber-700",children:text})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-1 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequirementItem,{achieved:requirements.length,text:"At least 8 characters long"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequirementItem,{achieved:requirements.lowercase&&requirements.uppercase,text:"Mix of uppercase and lowercase letters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequirementItem,{achieved:requirements.number,text:"At least one number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequirementItem,{achieved:requirements.special,text:"At least one special character (@, #, $, etc.)"})]});};export default PasswordRequirements;
